SEARCH
Package gw.api.rest.validation

Interface JsonValidatorContext

All Superinterfaces:
ValidatorContext
public interface JsonValidatorContext extends ValidatorContext
This context object is passed to JsonObjectValidators, and JsonPropertyValidators, and can be used to report errors.

  • Method Details

    • addPropertyError

      void addPropertyError(@NotNull @PropertyKey(resourceBundle="locale.display") @NotNull @PropertyKey(resourceBundle="locale.display") String messageKey, @NotNull @NotNull Object... messageArgs)
      Reports a validation error associated with the line number of the validated property, if any. If the property line number is unknown, either because the property was not specified on the input or because this JsonValidatorContext is being used with a JsonObjectValidator, the object's line number will be used.
      Parameters:
      messageKey - the display key to use for the error message
      messageArgs - the arguments to that display key, if any

    • addObjectError

      void addObjectError(@NotNull @PropertyKey(resourceBundle="locale.display") @NotNull @PropertyKey(resourceBundle="locale.display") String messageKey, @NotNull @NotNull Object... messageArgs)
      Reports a validation error associated with the line number of the validated object.
      Parameters:
      messageKey - the display key to use for the error message
      messageArgs - the arguments to that display key, if any

      JsonSchemaItems getSchemaItems()
